name: Movie Crosswords
description:
Play 20 Thematic crossword puzzles based on Movies and TV.
All the clues are related to films, actors and directors.
Don't worry if you don't know the answer, the help button is always ready for you.
From version 2.0 you can also play unlimited wordsearch puzzles with hidden sentence.


Features:
** NEW *** Wordsearch engine to play unlimited wordsearch puzzles related to movies.
20 crossword puzzles related to movies.
Smart interface, keyboard, clue and complete puzzle fit the screen.
2 ways to select a word, by tapping or swiping.
Skip over filled square option.
Check button with wrong squares highlighted.
Help me button (reveals the word).
Clear puzzle button.
Eraser tool (Clear more squares).
Universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.
